message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Hi Bob, I understand your offer of $120, but I was really hoping to get a bit more for the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell it to you for $135. What do you think?
I'm still a bit hesitant to go up to $135. I'd be willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so how about $125? Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
Hi Bob, I understand your offer of $125, but I'm still a bit short of my target. I'm willing to compromise and sell it to you for $130. What do you think?
I'm getting a bit frustrated with the back and forth, but I'm still interested in the product. I'm willing to go up to $128, but no more. Is that something you'd be willing to accept?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still not willing to accept $128. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so how about $132? What do you think?
